name: Autel MaxiCharger AC Wallbox Commercial缓冲区溢出漏洞
product: ["Autel MaxiCharger AC Wallbox Commercial <V1.39.51(American)", "Autel MaxiCharger AC Wallbox Commercial <V1.56.51(European)"]
description: Autel MaxiCharger AC Wallbox Commercial是美国Autel公司的一款智慧型AI电动车充电器。Autel MaxiCharger AC Wallbox Commercial存在缓冲区溢出漏洞，该漏洞源于ble_process_esp32_msg函数未能正确验证输入数据的长度大小，攻击者可利用该漏洞在系统上执行任意代码。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://store.autelenergy.com/products/ac-elite-business-50a-ev-charger
patch: Autel MaxiCharger AC Wallbox Commercial缓冲区溢出漏洞的补丁
